company_commercial_names: go little dearies | the little dearies
long_description: hand-crafted is heart-crafted. my name is karolina. i am a trained artist and passionate about art and graphic design. the little dearies is a concept that was born in 2012 in ireland as a result of a design project initiated by me and my husband alessandro. all products are made to order. in 2012, i discovered my passion for working with fimo polymer clay and sculpting techniques. handcrafted gifts are a work of art and leave lasting impressions. often, the best gifts are those you make yourself, but not everyone has the time or skills to make what they would love to share with others.

generated_description: the little dearies is a company based in swords, leinster, ireland, specializing in handcrafted, unique gifts inspired by mythical creatures and fairy tales. founded in 2012 by karolina and her husband alessandro, the company offers a variety of personalized and custom-designed products, including fairy doors, baubles, teapots, and keepsake frames. all items are made to order, ensuring each piece is individually crafted with meticulous attention to detail. the little dearies is a member of the crafts council of ireland since 2012.

long_description: the little dearies is a concept that was born in 2012 in ireland as a result of a design project initiated by karolina and alessandro - professional artists. we provide innovative, well designed unusual gifts and a unique experience. all our creations have been lovingly created using beautiful handmade, polymer clay fairies and a lot of kind of decorating. to reflect their natural environment each fairy has been surrounded by a mixture of dried flowers, preserved moss, fruits and seeds. playing with colours and textures and precision of execution will give your gifts a novelty look, not to be found in a run of the mill production.
